thread.section_title: AllAfrica News: Economy, Business and Finance
thread.title: Kenya: Somalia Wall Plan 'Still On'

title: Kenya: Somalia Wall Plan 'Still On'
text:
Somalia: High-Level Partnership Forum to Be Held in Mogadishu By Oliver Mathenge 
INTERIOR Cabinet Secretary Joseph Nkaissery yesterday said the government would not go back on its resolve to build a wall on the Kenya-Somalia border. 
Nkaissery said the government will put up "something physical" to keep away al Shabaab militants. 
"We all know that terrorists are into conventional; therefore we need to channel them to particular entry points so that we can see and vet them," he said. 
Nkaissery was updating the National Assembly Committee on Security. Kenya
